column16: What is your annual household income?
column17: What was your overall impression of this event (quality, lighting, sound, value)?
column18: Please share any other suggestions or ideas that would help us enhance your experience at Gesa Power House Theatre. If you would like someone to respond to your feedback, please include your contact information. Thank you!

column17:
When there is no video, do not even run the projector. Having colors and shapes come up on the screen was distracting.
When there are going to be flashing lights in a performance,  you need to warn the audience. You are lucky no one had an epileptic seizure. 
He had a very powerful voice that did not need amplification but he did use the microphone. The sound system needed to be modulated to take that into account as it was too loud.
column18: Installing a drinking fountain would be wonderful and much appreciated.  I do not want to buy a plastic bottle of water. Either that or let me bring my own bottle of water.

column17: It was disappointing not to have the videos accompanying the show. I’d like him to come back.
Great voice and Insturmentals.  So sorry the visuals did not work but music was still wonderful.

Alexander has a wonderful voice and seems like a nice guy. It was too bad the slideshow wasn’t working because that would’ve added some visual interest for sure. Overall the concert seemed like glorified karaoke. It was a surprise to not have any other musicians with him. It was on the edge of being too loud a lot of the time, as has been the case for other concerts. We left at intermission.

I think he is fantastic.  His rich voice vibrated through my body.  I was in the balcony seated 
 directly in front of him.  He didn't need the video screen behind him.  Could concentrate on his performance better.  Too bad WW Symphony couldn't play with him.  I never knew one could combine Rock and Opera.  I'm a fan.
column18: I think we are so fortunate he came to WW.  I hope he comes back some day.  I loved it.

column17: The projection system was not working at all and that was a big part of his show.  He was awful; did not hit all his notes, lip synced some songs, pretended to play his guitar when it was a recording.  It was the worst $90 I have spent.
